alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:06PM CDT until June 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ATCHISON AND NORTHWESTERN HOLT COUNTIES... At 905 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Craig, or 12 miles northeast of Falls City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mound City, Craig, Big Lake, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 83 and 102. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
